title: klintay
author: klintay
created_time: September 30, 2022, 10:28:52 PMLast edit: December 20, 2024, 05:12:37 PM by klintay
content: TANGENT is an experiment, a radical Web3 Cardano DeFi Protocol, token sale coming soon via LCX. I am not making any promises, but watch this space.Also DYOR !

comments.author: kojektea
comments.body: after doing IEO at LCX excange, will it be registered immediately?Or waiting for the next sale?I don't see official information when it's traded on the exchange or Dex

comments.author: Artik_Finance
comments.body: Now it is very difficult time to start - the falling market increase.Do you thing it is a good time to start the project?What do you thing about it?

comments.author: 100xcoin
comments.body: I checked the link https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/tangent/But there is no information about listing on exchanges.When do you plan to start listing and what cryptocurrency exchanges will you use?

comments.author: Dabs
comments.body: This looks like an interesting project. klintay is an old friend and we distributed miners and other hardware before a few years ago.

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: Dabs on October 01, 2022, 12:55:04 PMThis looks like an interesting project. klintay is an old friend and we distributed miners and other hardware before a few years ago.I too did a lot of gear/mining sales with Klintay.I recently promoted and acquired some NFT's from nutilah on this website.I read in the opening statement that they are going to try to wrap gaming into this.I like this idea. I an old school gear head. Any project linking the imaginary to hard gear has my interest.If the project stays in two worlds one of gear and one of digital NFTS maybe it will work.

comments.body: Quote from: philipma1957 on October 01, 2022, 01:17:07 PMQuote from: Dabs on October 01, 2022, 12:55:04 PMThis looks like an interesting project. klintay is an old friend and we distributed miners and other hardware before a few years ago.I too did a lot of gear/mining sales with Klintay.I recently promoted and acquired some NFT's from nutilah on this website.I read in the opening statement that they are going to try to wrap gaming into this.I like this idea. I an old school gear head. Any project linking the imaginary to hard gear has my interest.If the project stays in two worlds one of gear and one of digital NFTS maybe it will work.Now it is very important to attract attention to the project. It is a very difficult time to start and it is necessary to realize all planned ideas and create a product that will be really necessary for people.

comments.author: Beverly_Trees
comments.body: Quote from: Dabs on October 01, 2022, 12:55:04 PMThis looks like an interesting project. klintay is an old friend and we distributed miners and other hardware before a few years ago.So I see that now is the first day of the token sale. Lets check the project and monitor its developing.Now many big corporations are working with Web3 technologies and inspite the fall of the cryptocurrency market the demand in NFT products and tools continue to be very high.

comments.author: r_victory
comments.body: I saw it mentioned that there will be 15% available for NFT bounties. What kind of bounties will be distributed?

comments.author: klintay
comments.body: Quote from: r_victory on October 01, 2022, 04:07:27 PMI saw it mentioned that there will be 15% available for NFT bounties. What kind of bounties will be distributed?Bounties for NFT holders are airdropped as a surprise on special dates (such as Charles Hoskinson's birthday, etc). The details for this will be decided by the TangentDAO. As TANG is a governance token anyone who is a member of the TangentDAO can make a proposal to suggest improvements or changes to how the NFT bounty allocation is used. Proposals are voted on and if successful will be coded into the DAO. To be a member of the TangentDAO you must have at least 1 TANG token in your wallet.

comments.author: gt_addict
comments.body: Definitely interested in this. Been dealing with Klintay since I started in crypto many years ago. Looks like a great project and (as Phillipma1957 has said) anything that links the the physical is great.

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: gt_addict on October 01, 2022, 07:22:29 PMDefinitely interested in this. Been dealing with Klintay since I started in crypto many years ago. Looks like a great project and (as Phillipma1957 has said) anything that links the the physical is great. It is important to blend the hard assets in. I am old school but I remember Andy Warhols Campbell soup art in the 60s. He was mocked and pillaged for ruining art.I look at him as the father of the NFT movement.Maybe this project goes to a second chain. Lets say ETC.A cross chain concept that still uses hard iron (ETC needs gpus and or asics)and Cardano more of a pos coin. Melds pos and pow into a hybrid-platform.I will keep an eye out for this thread and list it as a watch thread.

comments.author: Meddzs
comments.body: This looks interesting, I'm going to keep an eye on this project

comments.author: Dragonbite
comments.body: Quote from: klintay on October 01, 2022, 07:19:56 PMQuote from: r_victory on October 01, 2022, 04:07:27 PMI saw it mentioned that there will be 15% available for NFT bounties. What kind of bounties will be distributed?Bounties for NFT holders are airdropped as a surprise on special dates (such as Charles Hoskinson's birthday, etc). The details for this will be decided by the TangentDAO. As TANG is a governance token anyone who is a member of the TangentDAO can make a proposal to suggest improvements or changes to how the NFT bounty allocation is used. Proposals are voted on and if successful will be coded into the DAO. To be a member of the TangentDAO you must have at least 1 TANG token in your wallet. Bounties with NFT attracts attention of the community but only in the case when project has a developed ecosystem and if NFT are tradable and have any value. First of all it is necessary to develop project and its ecosystem and then conduct a bounty that it will be more attractive, popular and profitable for users.

But popular only that NFTs that have big community of supporters and have value.Now many projects create NFTs but not all of them have volue.It is good that appear the projects that brings new ideas and new tools to use NFTs.

comments.author: kojektea
comments.body: Quote from: klintay on October 01, 2022, 07:12:32 PMQuote from: kojektea on October 01, 2022, 09:36:39 AMafter doing IEO at LCX excange, will it be registered immediately?Or waiting for the next sale?I don't see official information when it's traded on the exchange or DexYes after the IEO at LCX it will be registered there and begin trading immediately. You can check out more details here in this video:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nHtb0gAz0osWe also will begin trading soon after on a DEX (Minswap) and have another CEX planned for secondary trading within the first month. I want to say who but it would spoil the surprise   sounds good , but i am not very familiar with LCX exchange and maybe i will not participate in the IEO , i will buy it directly on the Minswap dex , then what about the tokens that are not sold out ?Will it be burned immediately or force it to be sold out

comments.body: Quote from: kojektea on October 02, 2022, 05:03:45 PMsounds good , but i am not very familiar with LCX exchange and maybe i will not participate in the IEO , i will buy it directly on the Minswap dex , then what about the tokens that are not sold out ?Will it be burned immediately or force it to be sold outA lot depends on the liquidity of exchange. Listing on the big exchange allows to attract attention to the IEO and tokens of the project.Liquidity is important for the project and its tokens.
